title: Pier Paolo Pasolini - Le Mura di Sana (1964)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0317933/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0317933/</a>

Pasolini saw Sana'a, the capital of Yemen, as a symbol of a civilisation that had not yet been contaminated by the ills of Western culture. On the last day of filming Flower of the Arabian Nights in the desert city, the director took some leftover film and documented the medieval Islamic architecture that so impressed him. He used these images to persuade UNESCO to make it a world heritage site.
